displayProperties.description: Investigate the Relic in the Enclave on Mars.
displayProperties.name: The Relic

1271443422.displaySource: "Whatever technologies the Black Fleet leaves for us to find, we must assume it does so willingly, and that thousands of its weapons still remain unseen." —Eris Morn

displayProperties.name: The Relic

3202230445.displaySource: "Artifact X, aka 'the Relic,' emits levels of Darkness energy comparable to the Black Fleet ships." —Hidden Report #5983

displayProperties.description:
Choose components to customize the Enigma Glaive. 

More components will become available as the weapon level increases. 

After you have chosen all of the components, press and hold the Shape button to create the Glaive.
displayProperties.name: The Relic

3202230444.displaySource: "Preliminary investigation suggests that Artifact X is related to, if not responsible for, the temporal disturbances on Mars, aka the 'wounds.'" —Hidden Report #5983

displayProperties.description: Access the Conduit on the side of the Relic.
displayProperties.name: The Relic

3202230447.displaySource: "It is this agent's opinion that Artifact X should be treated with extreme caution and possibly sealed off until the technology is better understood." —Hidden Report #5983

displayProperties.description: To upgrade the Enigma with enhanced traits, Ascendant Alloys are required. Speak with Rahool in the Tower to learn about this material.

658479834.displaySource: "Only through great challenge can we reap great rewards." —Ikora Rey

displayProperties.description:
The Enigma can be upgraded with enhanced intrinsics and traits by increasing its level. 

Level up the Enigma to Level 3.
displayProperties.name: Reshaping the Enigma

1232302363.displaySource: "A shape formed; a memory reconstituted." —Eris Morn

displayProperties.description: Return to the Relic in the Enclave on Mars.
displayProperties.name: Reshaping the Enigma

1232302361.displaySource: "You have the raw materials. What more can you glean?" —Eris Morn

displayProperties.description:
Select "Reshape" at the Relic in the Enclave on Mars, then select the Enigma.

The Enigma must be unlocked and unequipped to reshape.
displayProperties.name: Reshaping the Enigma

3099265193.displaySource: "A repeat performance? Or a variation on a theme?" —Eris Morn

displayProperties.description:
Insert an enhanced intrinsic to upgrade the Enigma.

These intrinsics grant an immediate stat boost as well as a smaller stat increase across all stats at level {var:125299441}.
displayProperties.name: Reshaping the Enigma

1232302360.displaySource: "This weapon is learning. Or perhaps… it's remembering?" - Eris Morn

displayProperties.description: Select an enhanced trait to insert into the Enigma.

displayProperties.description:
Complete a Vanguard Ops Playlist activity, Crucible match, or round of Gambit.

Completion will award a Deepsight Resonant weapon ready for Pattern extraction.

displayProperties.description:
You've obtained a weapon with Deepsight Resonance. Extract Pattern progress from the weapon, or dismantle it to make Pattern progress.

Extraction from Resonant weapons with Patterns will also make progress toward unlocking the Pattern to shape it at the Relic.
displayProperties.name: Foundry Resonance

displayProperties.description: Return to the Relic in the Enclave on Mars.

Pattern extraction from Deepsight Resonant weapons will also progress unlocking the Pattern to shape it at the Relic in the Enclave on Mars.
